dmca.title: theKidzPage complains of copying
dmca.body:
NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT, Blogspot User: forteach 
against copyright holder: theKidzpage,com 
April 2, 2007 

Pursuant to your instructions, to expedite your ability to process my request, please see the 
following in the format you provided: 

1. The copyrighted work that has been infringed upon by the following posts: 
http://thekidzpage.blogspot.com/2007/02/free-clipart-for-kids.html 
http://thekidzpage.blogspot.com/2007/02/free-kids-games-colouring-jigsaw.htm 

is copyright www.theKidzpage.com, owned and operated by divaDzine, [private], 
Tilbury, Ontario, Canada 

2. The material that is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in Item #1 above was found on: 
http://thekidzpage.blogspot.com/2007/02/free-clipart-for-kids.html 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/title3.gif
Original: http://wwww.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/images/title3.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/alphabet.gif 
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/catergories/alphahet.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/animals.gif 
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/categories/animals.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/tree-autumn-clipart-0001.gif 
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/seasons/autumn/free-autumn-clipart0001.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/character.gif 
Original: http:/1wthekid7page.comHreekidsclipart!categories/character.gif 

Stolen: htt.p:/.wisam.dkIinterneLgif 
Original; http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/catogories/internet.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/flowers.git 
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/categories/flowers.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/cO181.gif 
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/holidays/valentine%27s_day/c01 81.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/mixed.gif 
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/categories/mixed.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/people.gif 
Original: http:/www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/categories/people.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/car2.gif
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/transportation/car2.git
 
Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/art000l.gif 
Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/categories/art0O01.gif 

Stolen: http://www.wisam.dk/birds.gif 

Original: http://www.thekidzpage.com/freekidsclipart/categories/birds.gif 

There are more. In addition to the large list of stolen graphics above, the text has also been copied. Another blog entry, http://thekidzpage.blogspot.com/2007/02/free-kids-games-colouring-jigsaw.htm, is also riddled with stolen graphics and text. I have taken screenshots for personal reference and can send them to you if further information is required. 

Furthermore, the website that the blog entry links to is, as of April 2, 2007 when this letter was written, a website that is nearly a 100% copy of theKidzpage.com, both in written word as well as accompanying graphics. The only apparent differences are that links beginning with thekidzpage.com have been replaced with wisam.dk, the ad code has been replaced with alternate ad code (including Google Adsense ads), and the copyright statement has been altered to credit the imposter.
 
3. Information reasonably sufficient to permit Blogger to contact me (email address is preferred): 
[private]@thekidzpage.com 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury,that the information in the notification is accurate and that) am the cop If owner o am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
signed, [private]: Owner of divaDzine and theKidzpage.com 

Proof of theKidzpage.com
